name: generator-paker-lerna
description: This is my small scaffolding to start a monorepo

scripts.release:major: changelog -M && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'chore: release major version' && npm version major && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:minor: changelog -m && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'chore: release minor version' && npm version minor && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:patch: changelog -p && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'chore: release patch version' && npm version patch && git push origin && git push origin --tags
